channel.title: Strategy on George Hadjiyiannis
channel.description: Recent content in Strategy on George Hadjiyiannis

item.title: Culture eats Strategy for breakfast
item.description: We have all heard the saying, and I am willing to bet that most of us have even said it to others, or inserted it in a presentation. Yet I realized that, while everyone seems to understand this on an academic level, none of us seem to understand it intuitively. In particular, we are very bad at understanding the full effects of culture, or taking it into account when we are making decisions on a day to day basis.
